mapper.select: SELECT t1.followupResultId,t1.tempId,t1.followupTaskId,t1.followupAssignId, IFNULL(t3.patientId,t31.patientId) patientId,t1.patientUuid, t1.hospitalId,IF(t1.operator=9,t1.operator,IFNULL(t4.doctorId,t41.doctorId)) operator,t1.operatorUuid,t1.followupResultValue,t1.relapseParts,t1.relapseDate,t1.transferParts, t1.transferDate,t1.deathDate,t1.isInHospitalDeath,t1.isTumourDeath,t1.deathCause,t1.otherCause,t1.followupWay,t1.contentTemplateId, t1.followupResultPhone,t1.followupTime,t1.phoneRecordUrl,t1.remark, t1.sourceFlag,t1.createTime,t1.updateTime,t1.state, t1.lostFollowupFlag,t1.lostFollowupCauseResultValue,t1.oldLostFollowupFlag,t1.oldLostFollowupCauseResultValue, t1.mergeFlag,t1.mergeFromUuid,t1.mergeTargetUuid, t1.mergeTime,IF(t1.updateOperator=9,t1.updateOperator,IFNULL(t5.doctorId,t51.doctorId)) updateOperator,t1.updateOperatorUuid,t1.updateOperatorName, IF(t2.followupResultId is NULL ,1,2) opFlag FROM server_sync_temp_db.followup_result t1 LEFT JOIN followup_db.followup_result t2 ON t2.followupResultId=t1.followupResultId LEFT JOIN user_db.u_patient t3 ON t3.uuid=t1.patientUuid LEFT JOIN user_db.r_uuid_patient_relationship t31 ON t1.patientUuid=t31.uuid LEFT JOIN user_db.u_doctor t4 ON t4.uuid=t1.operatorUuid LEFT JOIN user_db.r_uuid_doctor_relationship t41 ON t1.operatorUuid=t41.uuid LEFT JOIN user_db.u_doctor t5 ON t5.uuid=t1.updateOperatorUuid LEFT JOIN user_db.r_uuid_doctor_relationship t51 ON t1.updateOperatorUuid=t51.uuid WHERE t1.batchId=#{batchId}
